name: LiDiA ~Emotional Adventure Game~
description:
Do you know that there is 95% of "You" that you have never met before?

It is a vast existence called the "unconsciousness."

It's not just supporting your physical condition and feelings.

It knows your character, your taste, or specialty.

And how you should live from now on; it knows everything inside you that even you don't know.

It remembers all the nostalgia you've had since you were born.

It's the "unconscious sea" inside of you.

Memories that you didn't know before you were born.

The "collective unconsciousness" lies deep within your memories.

With modern science, no one can yet see that world.

But maybe, somewhere, a lab has a device in place to see the unconscious sea right now.
